item.title: Need help with object making
item.dc:creator: @Quint Quint
item.description:
@Quint wrote:

ok i want to make a Bank booth somewhere (i know object id) i have this:

[code]
makeGlobalObject(3258,3432,2854,0,0);// reg wallz in ::train east
makeGlobalObject(3258,3433,2854,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3261,3435,2854,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3261,3436,2854,0,0);
makeGlobalObject(3261,3437,2854,0,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3260,3438,2854,3,0);//reg wallz in ::train north
	makeGlobalObject(3259,3438,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3258,3438,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3257,3438,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3256,3438,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3255,3438,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3252,3440,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3251,3440,2854,3,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3250,3440,2854,3,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3248,3438,2854,2,0);//reg wallz in ::train west
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3437,2854,2,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3436,2854,2,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3434,2854,2,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3433,2854,2,0);
	makeGlobalObject(3248,3432,2854,2,0);

	makeGlobalObject(3249,3431,2854,1,9);//diag wallz in ::train
	makeGlobalObject(3249,3439,2854,2,9);
	makeGlobalObject(3253,3439,2854,3,9);
	makeGlobalObject(3254,3438,2854,3,9);
	makeGlobalObject(3258,3434,2854,4,9);


	makeGlobalObject(3255,3431,4462,2,10); //theif table at ::Train

	makeGlobalObject(3254,3431,5959,3,4); // lever at ::train

	makeGlobalObject(3250,3431,409,2,10);// Prayer Altar = EXP

	makeGlobalObject(3252,3434,2107,2,10);// Phat Rock = EXP

	makeGlobalObject(3257,3431,[ID of bank booth],4,9); //bank booth [/code]

but it doesnt spawn the bank booth, only the walls and other objects

help plx[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 02:22:02 PM[/size][hr]help plx…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 02:48:56 PM[/size][hr]omg help!!
